byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and JULFIKAR ALI MANIK

abstract: At least ten people are killed and many more injured in stampede during bathing ritual in Langalbandh, Bangladesh.
lead_paragraph: The crush, which also injured dozens of pilgrims southeast of the capital, Dhaka, may have been set off by a rumor that a bridge was collapsing.

headline.main: Stampede at Hindu Bathing Ritual in Bangladesh Kills at Least 10
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: Stampede Kills 10 Hindu Pilgrims

snippet: The crush, which also injured dozens of pilgrims southeast of the capital, Dhaka, may have been set off by a rumor that a bridge was collapsing.
